preface.title: Introduction
preface.para: These tutorials are meant as a starting point for developers that have never worked with Pustefix. They introduce you to the different types of applications that can be implemented with Pustefix. Of course, they can only scratch at the surface of most of the features, if you are interested in an in-depth look at Pustefix, refer to the reference documentation.
